mapper.update: update app_bank_write_check set bank_write_check_id = #{bankWriteCheckId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, is_post_dated_check = #{isPostDatedCheck}, received_by = #{receivedBy}, date = #{date}, check_no = #{checkNo}, amount = #{amount}, memo = #{memo} where bank_write_check_id = #{bankWriteCheckId};
